name: The_Cauldron
description:
This game was developed as a part of the "One Game A Week" Project Seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Science in Hamburg, short UE Hamburg. 

The topic of the Week was: "Toys & Playfulness"

Description:

Just threw different Ingredients in a cauldron and see what happens!

Look around with your mouse!

Press [ I ] for an ingredients list for potions!

Press [ ESC ] to pause!

Credits:

• Danarcade_exe

• KaiH.
